context:
Add parent_id to tasks for subtask hierarchy. Simpler than full dependency graph.

Behavior:
- Tasks can have a parent_id referencing another task
- Parent can't complete until all children complete
- List shows hierarchy (indented or tree view)
- Optional: hierarchical IDs like beads (abc123.1, abc123.1.1)

Skip for now:
- Cross-task depends_on/blocked_by
- 'ready' command (unblocked tasks)

Prior art: github.com/steveyegge/beads (full graph model)
result: Implemented parent_id support: create/edit with --parent, tree view in list, subtask count in show, completion blocking, cascade delete. Updated types, task-service, CLI, and MCP tools.
